Package index

All functions

clueRIO clueRIO-package
clueRIO: Input/Output management for CLUMondo
clue_backup()
Backup the model output
clue_example()
Build an example CLUE scene
clue_goods()
Set goods or services and their attributes
clue_gridded()
Set drivers of land systems
clue_initiate()
Initiate a CLUE scene
clue_landtype()
Set land types and their attributes
clue_modify()
Apply a modifier to a CLUE scene
clue_options()
Set options of the current model run
clue_run()
Run the model
clue_scene()
Create a new CLUE scene
scene-class scene
CLUE scene class (S4) and methods
show(<scene>)
Print scene in the console
